about_the_game:
Personality compatibility for the 4th entry in the GP series, GP-03, is now coming to Steam!

This pack features events in which you can marry 2 or 4 maids at once!
After your Harem Wedding, there are 12 Harem Yotogi to try out with your maids.
There's also a new 3-person dance and 25 new edit parts!

This pack adds compatibility for the following 7 personalities:

-Compatible Personalities-
*Sexy and Ladylike Woman *Quiet and Loves to be Pampered Bookworm *Soft Cuddly Girl
*Mature, Level-Headed, and Dependable Secretary Maid
*Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-Lost Friend
*Friendly and Slightly Naughty Woman
*Overly Serious and Reserved Proper Lady

*You must have installed the corresponding Personality Packs to play this content with the above personalities.
*You must have installed CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2&2.5 + GP-03 to play this content.

1. New Mode

*Harem Marriage

2. New Yotogi

-Harem Empire-
*Harem Cowgirl Pussy-Eating Missionary
*Harem Anal Cowgirl Pussy-Eating Missionary
*Harem W Footjob
*Harem Face Cowgirl
*Harem Cowgirl & Caress
*Harem Anal Cowgirl & Caress
*Harem Sandwich Cowgirl and Face Cowgirl
*Harem Sandwich Anal Cowgirl & Face Cowgirl
*Harem Service Face-to-Face Cowgirl
*Harem Anal Service Face-to-Face Cowgirl
*Harem Face-to-Face
*Harem Anal Face-to-Face

3. New Dance

*memories sympathy

4. New Costumes

*Wedding Dress
*Nadeshiko Maid Uniform

5. Edit Mode

*20 Face Parts
*5 Nails
*To use the edit parts included in this DLC, you must have installed KCES or GP-01Fb.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.
